title.value: Влияние фактора сезонности на способность лабораторных крыс к выработке условно-рефлекторного навыка и на мнемотропные эффекты дипептида Leo-Pro hydrochloride
The effect of seasonality on capability of rats for passive avoidance conditioning and mnemotropic effects of dipeptides Leu-Pro hydrochloride

journal.title: Epizootiology, Immunobiology, Pharmacology, Sanitary Science : international scientific and practical journal

person.name: Ponteleeva, I.V., National Academy of Sciences, Minsk (Belarus). Institute of Bioorganic Chemistry

abstract.value: The capability for passive avoidance conditioning in undertraining (insufficient  training) conditions in outbred Wistar rats was significantly better in spring than in winter. Mnemotropic effects of dipeptide Leu-Pro  hydrochloride in relation to conditioning of Wistar rats in passive avoidance  task was influenced by seasonal factors and was changed in dose-dependent manner. In winter, the dipeptide has a pronounced nootropic effect when injected into animals at all doses tested (0,01, 0,1 and 0,5 mg/kg, intraperitoneally), and in the spring - no effect on learning ability (0,1 mg/kg, intraperitoneally) or significantly impairs the acquisition in passive avoidance task (0,01 and 0,5 mg/kg, intraperitoneally).
